text: “But what comes out of a person,that is what defiles. From within people,from their hearts,come evil thoughts, unchastity,theft,murder,adultery,greed,malice,deceit, licentiousness,envy, blasphemy,arrogance,folly. All these evils come from within and they defile.” Mark 7:20-23

Black mothers face racial bias in our health care system. It’s real and we need to speak that truth and address it. That’s why I introduced a bill to tackle racial bias that is causing this health crisis. https://rewire.news/article/2018/08/29/heres-how-kamala-harris-new-bill-would-address-the-racial-gap-in-maternal-deaths/

Don’t you forget that hundreds of children remain separated from their families by the federal government. I know there’s a lot going on, especially with the Kavanaugh hearings starting this week, but we cannot forget about what’s happening to these families. Keep speaking out.

Young people across America continue to demonstrate the kind of courage and determination we need from leaders in Congress in the fight against gun violence. I truly believe they are going to be the generation that ends the gun violence epidemic.
No one should have to choose between caring for their family or putting food on the table. We must fight for paid family and sick leave.
